text: The Battle off the coast of Jaffna was a naval battle. It was between the Navy of Sri Lanka and Tamil Tiger. According to Sri Lankan sources, this battle was on 1 November 2008. It was in northern territorial waters of Sri Lanka off Jaffna. This battle was part of the Sri Lankan Civil War. Category:November 2008 events Category:21st century in Sri Lanka Category:2000s in military history Category:21st-century battles
title: Battle off the coast of Jaffna
